description: Acid rain is caused by the reaction of pollutants such as sulfur dioxide and nitrogen dioxide with water vapor in the atmosphere.
heading: "Power plant","pH","Acid rain","Corrosion","Pest","Leaching","Wind power","Solar power","Emissions","Effluents"
head_description: "An industrial facility for generation of electricity.","The power of hydrogen that is a measure of acidity.","Rain with acidic nature formed due to the chemical reaction of water and pollutants.","The deterioration of metals due to chemicals.","An organism that damages crops.","The process of taking away of useful substances from an organism or soil.","Energy from wind that is converted into electrical energy.","Energy from the Sun that is converted into electrical energy.","Gaseous pollutants, such as dinitrogen trioxide (N<sub>2</sub>O<sub>3</sub>) released from automobiles.","Liquid pollutants, such as dinitrogen pentoxide (N<sub>2</sub>O<sub>5</sub>) released from industries."
